医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新肝脏指示治疗可改善稀有眼癌的预后莫菲特癌症中心（Moffitt Cancer Center）领导的一项多机构研究发现，使用Melphalan肝脏递送系统的经皮肝灌注可以帮助患有稀有眼癌的患者已扩散到肝脏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-liver-directed-wareatment-treatment-reatment-improves-ustcomes-for-rare-eye-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-liver-directed-wareatment-treatment-reatment-reatment-reatment-reatment-comes-for-for-rare-eye-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6992932-4039-4B78-A1B6-6-6EFCDCCCAFA8 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 21:29:32 -0400 New liver directed treatment improves outcomes for rare eye cancer
酒精重塑男性和女性大鼠的奖励学习不同慢性酒精暴露会导致雄性大鼠决策的持久损害，从而改变了大脑如何处理基于奖励的学习。一项新的研究揭示了纹状体中性别特异性的神经变化，尽管大脑活动改变了，但雌性大鼠表现出弹性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/alcohol-reshapes-reward-leard-learnning-differty-in-in-male-and-male-and-female-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/alcohol-reshapes-reward-leard-learnning-differy-in-male-and-male-and-female-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad4528A5-B723-45BD-45BD-AE87-1CCA03C0F420 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 21:20:00 -0400 Alcohol reshapes reward learning differently in male and female rats
新的数据 - 帕斯斯模型准确地预测了单个血糖反应如果您吃零食 - 例如肉丸，或者是棉花糖 - 它将如何影响您的血糖？这是一个令人惊讶的棘手问题：人体对不同食物的血糖反应因单个遗传学，微生物组，激素波动等而有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-data-sparse-model-curder-predicts-istividual-ividentual-glycemic---------- saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-data-sparse-model-curdel-predicts-istividual-ividendual-glycemictemic-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2FF2C1B-E959-4842-BD94-273E2585E32C Thu, 10 Apr 2025 21:13:48 -0400 New data-sparse model accurately predicts individual glycemic responses
了解运动员和老年人肩部受伤背后的关键危险因素肩膀在许多方面都是奇迹。一个肩膀有四个独立的关节，挤满了肌肉，使我们能够以八种不同的主要方式移动手臂，从而为我们提供了体内任何关节的最自由度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/understanding-key-risk-factors-behind-behind-should-shoulder-injuries-injuries-in-athletes-and-andletes-and-aging-aging-Adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/understanding-key-risk-factors-behind-behind-shoulder-injuries-injuries-in-athletes-and-andletes-and-aging-aging-avigns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0067d59b-7d0b-4068-bd5b-656a470952ce Thu, 10 Apr 2025 21:07:08 -0400 Understanding key risk factors behind shoulder injuries in athletes and aging adults
研究揭示了晚期癌症冷漠背后的脑电路许多癌症患者在生命尽头经历的疲劳和缺乏动力被认为是他们身体健康和极端体重减轻的不可避免的后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/study-reveals-brain-circuit-behind-apathy-in-apathy-in-Advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/study-reveals-brain-circuit-behind-behind-apathy-in-apathy-in-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6c11a1c-1f46-4787-AE27-AE27-2EB60FD863C6 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 21:01:59 -0400 Study reveals brain circuit behind apathy in advanced cancer

基因测试在早期发现致命的前列腺癌方面优于PSA和MRI英国一项研究发现，使用多基因风险评分鉴定前列腺癌遗传风险最高的男性可显着改善对临床重要疾病的检测。这种方法吸引了标准PSA和MRI筛查会错过的激进癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/genetic-test-performs-psa-and-mri-in-spotting-deadly-prostate-prostate-cancer-early.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/genetic-test-performs-psa-and-mri-in-spotting-deadly-prostate-prostate-cancer-early.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5A30353-5C2A-44D7-99DB-F2C42793B150 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 20:44:00 -0400 Genetic test outperforms PSA and MRI in spotting deadly prostate cancer early
小RFK小的FOIA员工在FDA的工作人员中抢走了从事Covid疫苗诉讼的人员FDA的大规模射击已经削减了该部门的划分，该部门释放了该机构在烟草，食品，医疗设备和兽医医学等部门的监管活动产生的公共记录。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/rfk-jre28099s-purge-of-foia-foia-staff-ataff-at-fda-spares-spares-spares-people-people--------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/rfk-jre28099s-purge-of-foia-foia-staff-ataff-at-fda-fda-spares-spares-people-people---------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709b922f-8799-4917-b058-581dbab8377d Thu, 10 Apr 2025 20:39:18 -0400 RFK Jr.’s purge of FOIA staff at FDA Spares people working on covid vaccine lawsuits

Kennedy Jr.）宣布的卫生和公共服务部重组一周后，工作人员削减和计划削减的范围开始变得明确。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-the-health-the-dismantling-hhs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/kff-health-news-what-what-what-the-health-the-health-the-dismantling-hhs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1707291C-E174-4632-B2A4-0FAA220F6AA8 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 20:35:40 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': The dismantling of HHS
迷幻药可以打破肥胖症中强迫性饮食习惯吗？牛津研究人员的评论探讨了诸如psilocybin和LSD之类的迷幻药如何有助于破坏肥胖个体子集的强迫饮食行为。该论文概述了提出的神经生物学，表观遗传学和肠脑机制，同时强调了对人类试验的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/can-psychedelics-break-compulsive-eating-habits-habits-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/can-psychedelics-break-compulsive-compulsive-eating-habits-habits-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb4b19ff-9d58-44ca-ab62-e2092d4926eb Thu, 10 Apr 2025 19:35:00 -0400 Can psychedelics break compulsive eating habits in obesity?
